segments.text: I can’t believe how careless the woman is—water is everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying that plate like nothing’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she doesn’t even glance at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so frustrated watching this—it’s like she’s in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are about to fall, and she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to notice the mess or the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is a slip hazard, and she’s just standing in the water like it’s normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how unaware she is—someone needs to shake her out of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is infuriating because it’s so preventable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to yell at her to look around!
segments.speaker: PAR
